input.description: Upload an invoice file (PDF, JPEG, or PNG) via 'orch call'

files.description: Invoice file(s) to scan - uploaded automatically when using 'orch call agent file.pdf'

invoiceNumber.description: Invoice reference number with confidence score

invoiceDate.description: Invoice date (ISO 8601 format) with confidence score

currency.description: Currency code (GBP, USD, EUR) with confidence score

totalAmount.description: Total amount to pay with confidence score

lineItems.description: List of items on the invoice (name, quantity, unitCost, totalCost)
